co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.infineon.apdu

Class BaseCommandApdu

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.infineon.apdu.BaseCommandApdu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangePinApdu, GenerateKeyFromSeedApdu, GenerateKeyPairApdu, GenerateSignatureApdu, GetKeyInfoApdu, SelectApplicationApdu, SetPinApdu, UnlockPinApdu, VerifyPinApdu

    public abstract class BaseCommandApdu
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Command APDUs sent to card. Represents a Command APDU as specified in ISO 7816-4
